prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Bass, Piano, Drums, Pipe, Guitar, but without Organ.
captions:
Style 1:
This piece of music features Bass, Piano, Drums, Pipe, and Guitar, but no Organ.

Style 2:
This song is composed of Bass, Piano, Drums, Pipe, and Guitar, but excludes Organ.

Style 3:
This composition is made up of Bass, Piano, Drums, Pipe, and Guitar, Organ not included.
